#{nodeCode} ) t1 --用水单位 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT plan_year, cur_year_plan AS curYearPlan, use_water_unit_id, first_quarter AS oneFirstQuarter, second_quarter AS secondQuarter, third_quarter AS thirdQuarter, fourth_quarter AS fourthQuarter FROM t_w_use_water_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} ) t2 --用水计划 ON t1.id = t2.use_water_unit_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT use_water_unit_id, use_year, water_meter_code as waterMeterCode, ( january_count + february_count + march_count ) AS onePracticalWater, ( april_count + may_count + june_count ) AS twoPracticalWater, ( july_count + august_count + september_count ) AS t_w_use_water_base_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} ) t4 --基建计划 ON t1.id = t4.use_water_unit_Id AND t2.plan_year = t4.plan_year LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count_year, use_water_unit_id, MIN ( [1] ) AS oneStatus, MIN ( [2] ) AS twoStatus, MIN ( [3] ) AS threeStatus, MIN ( [4] ) AS fourStatus FROM t_w_water_use_pay_info --水使用量季度缴费表 PIVOT ( MIN ( pay_status ) FOR [count_quarter] IN ( [1], [2], [3], [4] )) AS pvtGROUP WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} GROUP BY use_water_unit_id, count_year ) t5 ON t1.id = t5.use_water_unit_id AND t2.plan_year = t5.count_year ) t6 WHERE t6.nodeCode = #{nodeCode}

and t6.unitName like '%${unitName}%'
and t6.id IN ( SELECT id FROM t_w_use_water_self_define_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} AND SUBSTRING ( unit_code, 3, 2 ) IN ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{loginId}))
